key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and potential compliance costs
Intense competition from larger banks and fintech companies
Customer retention challenges due to service quality
controversies: Federal scrutiny from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC)
Customer complaints related to service and operational inefficiencies
social_issues: Customer satisfaction challenges and potential loss of loyalty
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks, particularly in AML and data privacy
